name: Jamomapuredata
body:
### Welcome Jamoma for Puredata page

You will find both nightly builds and releases there.
We are trying to provides binary for Linux 32 & 64 bit, Raspberry Pi, OS X and Windows (as soon as possible).

To use it, download the archive corresponding to your platform and unpack it in your `~/pd-externals` folder on Linux, `~/Library/Pd` folder on Mac OS X and somewhere on Windows.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
